title: 250: Chatting with Jade & Jenna about Reality Steve
itunes:title: 250: Chatting with Jade & Jenna about Reality Steve
description:
(Content Warning: self harm and s*xual assault)Today The Broads have a conversation about follow up from their recent episode regarding Reality Steve’s past blog entries (if you have not listened to the previous episode please see below to find episode linked). They discuss his apology and live, their thoughts, Demi Burnett’s tweets addressing Steve’s recent phone call, power dynamics, and more. The Broads are then joined by Jade Roper Tolbert (The Bachelor and BIP) who was a victim of many of Steve’s misogynist posts - she discusses the harm those posts caused, the backlash, why she is speaking on it now, and more. They are then joined by Jenna Cooper (The Bachelor and BIP) who talks about the fake texts that were sent to and made public by Steve, the job loss and massive grief that followed, where she is at now, the reality of the situation, forgiveness, and a lot more. 
***Thank you so much to these amazing women who were willing to come on a share their stories - please send them all the #broadsquad love and support!

 

LAST EPISODE ON REALITY STEVE:https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/248-discussing-colton-bach-nation-misogynist-exposed/id1441571050?i=1000517872322

JADE ROPER TOLBERT

:Follow her on instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jadelizroper/

JENNA COOPER:

Follow her on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/jennacooperfit/

FOLLOW CHATTY BROADS:

Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/chattybroads/

Bekah: https://www.instagram.com/bekah/

Jess: https://www.instagram.com/thebaddmom/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCzx2N1qxFObhvSvf9tp7ayQ

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***BLENDERS: Go to BLENDERESEYEWEAR.COM and use code CHATTYVIP for 15% off!

***OPENFIT: Get a FREE 14-day trial membership to Openfit when you text CHATTY to 505050

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM and enter promo code CHATTY to get $25 off your first box!

***MODERN FERTILITY: Modern Fertility is offering our listeners $20 off the test when you go to MODERNFRETILITY.COM/CHATTY 

***ANCIENT NUTRITION: go to ANCIENTNUTRITION.COM and enter promo code CHATTY for 20% off your first order!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
